Session 4 - 3/17/2024

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Recap and Housekeeping
  • My shield is equipped now so it’s in one hand and my quarterstaff in the other - I don’t need to use my shield as an Action to have it equipped but it’s in one hand now
  • Lillyblossom is a 3rd level Paladin now
  • Kermit is a bullywog sage
  • Goose is “worth it’s weight in gold” and is back in Billowbarrow “if it is still alive”
  • Kermit is a moron, why did we let him do anything. Canonically he is a moron
  • Old Young Kenjamin is a level 1 rogue now
  • Lilyblossom is on her way to rescue us!
  • Old Young Kenjamin jumps on the rope and is safe
  • Frogger Toadman does NOT jump in the blimp, he just leaves… maybe forever
  • After Bart does most of the damage with just his bare fists…. Not Oz or I with our cool spells…. A BULLYWOG KILLS THE DRAGON INSTEAD OF US
  • All hail the dragonslayer
  • Lilyblossom heals Oz instead of me because she loves old men
  • We see that the Baron and Frogge Ttoadman are not in the blimp
